alert.note: Alert for Cooke; Denton; Montague (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 19 at 4:32PM CDT until September 19 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Montague County in north central Texas... Northern Denton County in north central Texas... Southern Cooke County in north central Texas... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 431 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles south of St. Jo, or 18 miles east of Bowie, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Sanger, Pilot Point, Aubrey, Lindsay, Ray Roberts Park Isle Du Bois, Ray Roberts Park Johnson Branch, Lake Kiowa, Road Runner, Valley View, Prairie Point, Leo, Rosston, Lois, Forestburg, Lake Ray Roberts, Era, Woodbine, Burns, and Hood. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 478 and 498. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
